QuestData.Title: The Captured Scout
QuestData.Description: I've heard about you, $n, and the news you brought from the south. The battle has reached a stalemate.$B$BOne that I fear is about to be broken by the Firelord's reawakening.$B$BThat is unless we tip the scales in our favor in some way.$B$BThere is a scout that was captured by the Twilight's Hammer. I believe she was in possession of valuable intelligence. Find her in the Twilight camp to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Scout Larandia at the Twilight Command Post in Mount Hyjal.
